name: Widening trend
functionStatement: Long-term changes in channel size and slope maintain dynamic equilibrium and diverse habitats while interacting with the floodplain.
descriptionMarkdown: Bank erosion/migration rates match natural reference; no excessive widening unless historically typical.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Map active channel edges across years and compute width change using imagery and field indicators where feasible.

levels.label: Optimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Lateral changes are in line with natural or historical reference.

levels.label: Suboptimal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Slightly more or less migration than expected.

levels.label: Marginal
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Significantly above or below reference with frequent failures or constrained banks.

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Highly accelerated or highly suppressed lateral change far outside expected ranges.

references: NAIP or Google Earth historical imagery
